title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 369.12 - Accounting of disclosures
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 369.12 - Accounting of disclosures

State Regulations

Accounting shall be retained as part of the record
disclosed for five years after disclosure of the record or the life of the
record disclosed, whichever is longer. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
369.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
